problem.p: A wheel of radius \(R\) is translating and rotating. How does the velocity of the center of mass \(V_{cm}\) relate to the angular velocity around the center of mass \(\omega_{cm}\)? consider the following situations:

The wheel is slipping:
\( V_{cm}= R \omega_{cm} \) \( V_{cm} \gt R \omega_{cm} \) \( V_{cm} \lt R \omega_{cm} \)
